value:
A festival for those who sneak
through the darkness... There
must be a reason for this.

If I become a ninja master, I
can complete difficult missions.
This will be of use to Laegjarn.

There is said to be a ninja art of
coiled flame... If I were in Múspell,
I could master it.

Is there a reason the amount
of fabric used for ninja gear is
so...little?

I do not favor stealth. But to be a
ninja... I must erase my presence.

I have infiltrated the castle...
And stolen information for
$Nf.
Perish...in the darkness...

The blade conceals the heart.
Like me, a ninja is a weapon.

I will never master the skills of
the ninja like this...

I understand. I will learn this
technique, as you ask.

I am Laevatein, ninja of Múspell.
I will become a ninja master...for
Laegjarn.

I have been investigating you
these past few days.$k$pAs hard as I try, there are things I
cannot understand... Who are you?
What is your goal?$k$pI did find out one thing.$k$pYou are not my sister's enemy.$k$pSomeday, I will learn more. I will use
my ninja skills...and unmask you.
てやっ
殺す
くうっ…
いけない…
I will take your life.
Disappear.
Our meeting was fated.
I am more than the blade.
I have failed...
うーん…
I am Laevatein. For the festival, I have dressed as a ninja.
*gasp* A ninja must be invisible. It seems...I am not.
I can move more easily in these clothes. So now, I am more useful to Laegjarn. That is all I can ask.
They say that a skilled ninja can walk on water or soar through the air. This will be a challenge.
A ninja can uncover the most carefully guarded secrets... What can I find out for you?
As a ninja I don't have anything more to find out…I have already learned all there is to know about my sister.
To become a true ninja, I must redouble my efforts. You will help me.
Understood.
Quiet...
I will investigate.
